description:
See what your favourite summer hikes are like in the winter. These lightweight recreational snowshoes provide the traction and float you need for casual hikes in moderate terrain. Their narrower shape is designed to suit women's foot shape and stride pattern, with a soft-pivot harness for smooth steps on undulating ground.

  • Lightweight aluminum frame
  • Entech decking is lightweight and abrasion-resistant
  • Asymmetric harness fits women's narrower feet well
  • Spin binding ratcheting cable cinches down with a quick twist
  • Toe and heel crampons provide traction on slopes
name: GV Snowshoes Active Winter SPIN Snowshoes - Women's
